title: How to write a dialogue between me and my mother - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question is pretty vague. Are you trying to write a dialogue in a story or trying to write out a dialogue between the two of you to resolve a problem in your current life? If it is a scene for a novel, it needs to contain a goal, motivation and conflict. This crummy example is in 1st person POV “Chris is a great guy.” My hands clenched into fists. “So he’s lived a little rough. It’s a date. It’s not like—”“What?” Mom said. “You’re gonna marry him?” She rinsed a glass and put it in the dishwasher. “That’s how it starts, you know. How it always starts. It’s just for fun, I’m young… and then suddenly you’re… not.”Pregnant was what she’d meant to say. Pregnant and alone in an unhappy marriage.
